raw_data/objects/obj-alive-set-potential.label: obj-alive-set-potential-operator
raw_data/objects/obj-alive-set-potential.name: Rescaled Potential Operator for the Alive Set
raw_data/objects/obj-alive-set-potential.mathematical_expression: The **Rescaled Potential Operator for the Alive Set**, denoted $V_{\text{op},\mathcal{A}}$, is a deterministic function that maps the raw reward and distance vectors of an alive set of size $k=|\mathcal{A}_t|$ to a vector of fitness potentials for that same set.

raw_data/objects/obj-boundary-regularity.label: obj-boundary-regularity-constants
raw_data/objects/obj-boundary-regularity.name: Boundary Regularity Constants
raw_data/objects/obj-boundary-regularity.mathematical_expression: Constants characterizing HÃ¶lder continuity of post-perturbation death probability via heat-kernel smoothing on smooth boundaries.

raw_data/objects/obj-canonical-fragile-s.label: obj-canonical-fragile-swarm
raw_data/objects/obj-canonical-fragile-s.name: Canonical Fragile Swarm
raw_data/objects/obj-canonical-fragile-s.mathematical_expression: A concrete, complete instantiation of the Fragile Gas framework that serves as an existence proof for the axiom system. It specifies all foundational, environmental, and algorithmic components with standard, well-behaved choices.

raw_data/objects/obj-cloning-probability.label: obj-cloning-probability-lipschitz-constants
raw_data/objects/obj-cloning-probability.name: Cloning Probability Lipschitz Constants
raw_data/objects/obj-cloning-probability.mathematical_expression: Collection of per-walker Lipschitz constants for cloning probability function and related structural/value continuity factors.

raw_data/objects/obj-companion-selection.label: obj-companion-selection-measure
raw_data/objects/obj-companion-selection.name: Companion Selection Measure
raw_data/objects/obj-companion-selection.mathematical_expression:
For each walker $i \in \{1, \dots, N\}$ in a swarm $\mathcal{S}$ with alive set $\mathcal{A}$, the **Companion Selection Measure**, $\mathbb{C}_i(\mathcal{S})$, is a **uniform discrete probability measure** over a support set $S_i \subseteq \{1, \dots, N\}$ of valid companion indices. The support set is defined as:
* If walker $i$ is alive ($i \in \mathcal{A}$) and there is at least one other alive walker ($|\mathcal{A}| \ge 2$), the support set is all other alive walkers: $S_i := \mathcal{A} \setminus \{i\}$.
* If walker $i$ is dead ($i \notin \mathcal{A}$) and the alive set is not empty ($|\mathcal{A}| \ge 1$), the support set is all alive walkers: $S_i := \mathcal{A}$.
* If walker $i$ is the only one alive ($|\mathcal{A}| = 1$ and $\mathcal{A} = \{i\}$), it is its own companion: $S_i := \{i\}$.
* If the swarm is empty ($|\mathcal{A}|=0$), the support set is empty: $S_i := \emptyset$.

The measure is defined as $\mathbb{C}_i(\mathcal{S})(\{j\}) = 1/|S_i|$ if $j \in S_i$ and $|S_i|>0$, and 0 otherwise. The expectation of any function $f$ under this measure is $\mathbb{E}_{j \sim \mathbb{C}_i(\mathcal{S})}[f(j)] = \frac{1}{|S_i|} \sum_{j \in S_i} f(j)$.

raw_data/objects/obj-continuity-constant.label: obj-continuity-constants-table
raw_data/objects/obj-continuity-constant.name: Continuity Constants Table
raw_data/objects/obj-continuity-constant.mathematical_expression: Consolidated table of constants used across absolute-value and mean-square continuity results, organized by type (environment, geometry, noise, dynamics, regularization, cloning, structure, measurement, aggregation, standardization, rescale, potential, boundary, distance).

raw_data/objects/obj-cubic-patch-polynom.label: obj-cubic-patch-polynomial
raw_data/objects/obj-cubic-patch-polynom.name: Cubic Polynomial Patch
raw_data/objects/obj-cubic-patch-polynom.mathematical_expression: P(z) = az^3 + bz^2 + cz + d \text{ on } [z_{\max}-1, z_{\max}] \text{ with } C^1 \text{ boundary conditions}

raw_data/objects/obj-distance-measuremen.label: obj-distance-measurement-ms-constants
raw_data/objects/obj-distance-measuremen.name: Distance Measurement Mean-Square Constants
raw_data/objects/obj-distance-measuremen.mathematical_expression: Collection of constants controlling mean-square continuity bounds for distance-to-companion measurement with empirical companion selection.

raw_data/objects/obj-expected-distance-e.label: obj-expected-distance-error-coefficients
raw_data/objects/obj-expected-distance-e.name: Expected Distance Error Coefficients
raw_data/objects/obj-expected-distance-e.mathematical_expression: The coefficients that appear in the deterministic bound on the change of the expected raw distance vector between two swarm states.
